compatibility.notes: The Lucida-Bitmap-Fonts license allows for proprietary use but does not permit integration with open-source licenses that require derivative works to be open-sourced.

key_requirements: Must not change the code or output except as authorized.
Must not modify the fonts and bit-mapped images to use the Lucida trademark.
license.name: Lucida-Bitmap-Fonts
obligations: Include copyright notices in user documentation and internal comments.
Do not modify the appearance of the icons or glyphs except as necessary for standard resolution.
Validation by AT&T is required for the use of the OPEN LOOK trademark.
